DOC.brief_summary: This study will address the treatment rate and control rate of hypertension, treatment pattern and factors that affect BP control by examining retrospective medical records of hypertension patients recovering from stroke, among outpatients coming to the Neurology Department in 10 university hospitals nationwide.
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Treatment Pattern Survey for the Patients With Hypertension and Stroke
DOC.criteria: Patients had been hospitalized as a acute stroke in 2006 Patient with history of stroke receiving hypertension medication during at least 1 year. Secondary hypertension patients Patients not receiving hypertension medication
